original: Bruun, Tage Henrik, vicekonsul, Kalmar, f. 4/12/83 i Kalmar av groissh. J. M. B. o. Maria Jeansson. G. m. Kerstin Gille. Barn: Margit f. 09, g. m. dir. H. A. Huldschiner, Sthlm, Gulli 11, g. m. dir. Olof Strid, Ingrid 12, g. m. kapt. i gen:staben K. G. Lin-nell, Rolf 20, civ:ekonom. — Genomg. 7 kl. h. a. 1. i Kalmar, hand:sk. i Dresden, språkstud. i Tyskl. o. Engl. Anst. ett år i spannm:firma i Königsberg, i Firma J. Bruun sed. 02, verkst. dir. i A-B J. Bruun sed. 27, verkst. dir. f. A-B Björnö Egend., verkst. dir. i A-B Kalmar Byggn :varor. Led. av Smål. o. B’1’ek. hand :k’amm. ;skii!lj€nd, av Sv. skiil’-jend f. spannm :hand., ordf. i Skånska Bankens avd:kont. istyr. o. i Sydöstra Sv:es spannm :handl :fören., styr :led. i flera branschfören., fd. led. av stads-fullm. Danm. vicekons. i Kalmar sed. 18. Hobbies: jakt, tennis. RDDO.
translated: Bruun, Tage Henrik, Vice Consul, Kalmar, born on December 4th, 1883 in Kalmar to grocer J.M.B. and Maria Jeansson. Married to Kerstin Gille. Children: Margit born in 1909, married to director H.A. Huldschiner, Stockholm, Gulli born in 1911, married to director Olof Strid, Ingrid born in 1912, married to Captain in the General Staff K.G. Linnell, and Rolf born in 1920, a civil economist. Completed 7 grades of primary school in Kalmar, studied handwriting in Dresden, and language studies in Germany and England. Worked for a year in a grain company in Königsberg, then in J. Bruun Company from 1902, becoming Managing Director in AB J. Bruun in 1927, Managing Director of AB Björnö Egend., and Managing Director of AB Kalmar Byggn :varor. A member of the chambers of commerce in Smål., B’1’ek., and Sv. skiil’-jend for grain trading, Chairman of Skånska Bankens avd:kont. istyr., and Southeastern Sweden grain trading association, board member of several industry associations, and former member of the city council, Danm.. He has been the Vice Consul in Kalmar since 1918. His hobbies are hunting and tennis. RDDO.
